casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Steven K. STANLEY Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 31, 2018

Peter G. Billings, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Walker, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 903, 174 A.3d 864 (2017), is denied.
